nodes.login.supported.methods (this is a comment): P. SSH with password; K. SSH with key file (e.g. ec2_key.pem)
nodes.login.notes (this is a comment): All nodes must use the same sudo user, same password, or same key file

HA.option.Notes of HA.option (this is a comment): option to install high-availability cluster (with at least 3 nodes), default value false
